info.description: APIs of Divit Pay-later service for merchant

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://sandbox-api.divit.dev/orders \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"totalAmount":{"amount":0,"currency":"string"},"nonrefundableAmount":{"amount":0,"currency":"string"},"refundableAmount":{"amount":0,"currency":"string"},"webhook_success":"string","webhook_failure":"string","webhook_events":"string","partnerRef":"string","OrderItems":[{"OrderType":"string","OrderData":{"departure":{"iataCode":"string","terminal":"string","at":"string"},"arrival":{"iataCode":"string","at":"string"},"carrierCode":"string","number":"string","aircraft":{"code":"string"},"operating":{"carrierCode":"string"},"duration":"string","id":"string","numberOfStops":0,"":"string"}}]}'

  Authorization:'Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  content-type:application/json

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("sandbox-api.divit.dev")

payload = "{\"totalAmount\":{\"amount\":0,\"currency\":\"string\"},\"nonrefundableAmount\":{\"amount\":0,\"currency\":\"string\"},\"refundableAmount\":{\"amount\":0,\"currency\":\"string\"},\"webhook_success\":\"string\",\"webhook_failure\":\"string\",\"webhook_events\":\"string\",\"partnerRef\":\"string\",\"OrderItems\":[{\"OrderType\":\"string\",\"OrderData\":{\"departure\":{\"iataCode\":\"string\",\"terminal\":\"string\",\"at\":\"string\"},\"arrival\":{\"iataCode\":\"string\",\"at\":\"string\"},\"carrierCode\":\"string\",\"number\":\"string\",\"aircraft\":{\"code\":\"string\"},\"operating\":{\"carrierCode\":\"string\"},\"duration\":\"string\",\"id\":\"string\",\"numberOfStops\":0,\"\":\"string\"}}]}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'Authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

$body->append('{"totalAmount":{"amount":0,"currency":"string"},"nonrefundableAmount":{"amount":0,"currency":"string"},"refundableAmount":{"amount":0,"currency":"string"},"webhook_success":"string","webhook_failure":"string","webhook_events":"string","partnerRef":"string","OrderItems":[{"OrderType":"string","OrderData":{"departure":{"iataCode":"string","terminal":"string","at":"string"},"arrival":{"iataCode":"string","at":"string"},"carrierCode":"string","number":"string","aircraft":{"code":"string"},"operating":{"carrierCode":"string"},"duration":"string","id":"string","numberOfStops":0,"":"string"}}]}');

$request->setBody($body);

$request->setHeaders([

  'Authorization' => 'Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN'
]);

$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();

post.description: Authentication of user credentials. Credentials for API access is given out by Divit representatives.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://sandbox-api.divit.dev/login \
  --header 'Authorization: Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"client_id":"string","client_secret":"string"}'

echo '{"client_id":"string","client_secret":"string"}' |  \
  http POST https://sandbox-api.divit.dev/login \
  Authorization:'Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN' \
  content-type:application/json

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("sandbox-api.divit.dev")

payload = "{\"client_id\":\"string\",\"client_secret\":\"string\"}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'Authorization': "Bearer REPLACE_BEARER_TOKEN"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/login", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))
